Uses of Class
com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.components.Dialogs.DialogAction

  • Packages that use Dialogs.DialogAction 
    Package Description
    com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.components
    Provides useful GUI (graphical user interface) components, none of which are necessary for creating a plugin, but many plugin implentations will find these components useful.

    • Uses of Dialogs.DialogAction in com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.components

      Fields in com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.components declared as Dialogs.DialogAction 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Dialogs.DialogAction Dialogs.CANCEL
      An action with "Cancel" as its label.
      static Dialogs.DialogAction Dialogs.CONTINUE
      An action with "Continue" as its label.
      static Dialogs.DialogAction[] Dialogs.CONTINUE_CANCEL
      Use this to specify that a dialog should have "Continue" and "Cancel" buttons.
      static Dialogs.DialogAction Dialogs.NO
      An action with "No" as its label.
      static Dialogs.DialogAction Dialogs.OK
      An action with "OK" as its label.
      static Dialogs.DialogAction[] Dialogs.OK_CANCEL
      Use this to specify that a dialog should have "OK" and "Cancel" buttons.
      static Dialogs.DialogAction[] Dialogs.OK_ONLY
      Use this to specify that a dialog should have just an "OK" button.
      static Dialogs.DialogAction Dialogs.YES
      An action with "Yes" as its label.
      static Dialogs.DialogAction[] Dialogs.YES_NO
      Use this to specify that a dialog should have "Yes" and "No" buttons.
      static Dialogs.DialogAction[] Dialogs.YES_NO_CANCEL
      Use this to specify that a dialog should have "Yes", "No" and "Cancel" buttons.
      Methods in com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.components with parameters of type Dialogs.DialogAction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Dialogs.DialogOptions.setCancelButton(Dialogs.DialogAction cancelButton)
      Set the button which is treated as a cancel button.
      void Dialogs.DialogOptions.setCloseAction(Dialogs.DialogAction closeAction)
      Sets the action associated with clicking the windows's close button (the X in the top-right hand corner of the window in Windows).
      void Dialogs.DialogOptions.setDefaultButton(Dialogs.DialogAction defaultButton)
      Set the button which is the dialogs default button.
